title: Just curious about some marks
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710080920im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_fontlibrarysymbols_4112.jpg)

In my travels around the innerwebs I have seen this sort of issue where marks would appear next to a font name in design software such as Illustrator. What does the diamond, exclamation, quotation and hash tag marks marks represent?  
I grabbed the attached image from the innerwebs and is apparently a screen grab of Illy on a Mac. I only use MS products and I can't seem to replicate these marks at all on any my machines.
author: 5star
